title: Quiz 5: Feb 2021 FQE
description: Final Qualifying Examination - February 2021. Covers PowerPoint, Excel, Networking, and Flowcharts.

questions.question: To start Microsoft PowerPoint application

options.text: Click on start >> programs >> all programs >> Ms power point
Hit ctrl+e then type ppoint.exe and enter
Click start >> run then type power point then press enter
Hit ctrl+s then type power point

questions.explanation: The standard method is Start > All Programs > Microsoft Office > Microsoft PowerPoint.

questions.question: PowerPoint presentations are widely used for the following except
questions.explanation: Mail setup is for email clients, not presentation software.
questions.hint: Sending letters is not done in PowerPoint.

questions.question: What PowerPoint feature will one use to apply motion affects to different objects of a slide
questions.explanation: Animation Schemes apply motion to objects within a slide.

questions.question: What feature will on use to apply motion effects in between a slide exists and another enters
questions.explanation: Slide Transitions control the effect between slides.
questions.hint: Transitioning from one to the next.

questions.question: In which menu can you find features like slide design and slide layout
questions.explanation: In older PowerPoint versions, these were under the Format menu.
questions.hint: It controls the look or format.

questions.question: Which shortcut key inserts a new slide in current presentation
questions.explanation: Ctrl+M adds a new slide. Ctrl+N creates a new file.

questions.question: What is the best way to create another copy of a slide

options.text: Click the slide then pres ctrl+A and paste in new slide
From insert menu choose duplicate slide
Redo everything on a new slide
On the slide panel click the slide, press ctrl+C then hit ctrl+Z

questions.explanation: Using 'Duplicate Slide' is the standard way.

questions.question: In a PowerPoint presentation

options.text: Sound clips can be inserted but not movie clips
Movie clips can be inserted but not sound clips

questions.explanation: PowerPoint supports both audio and video.

questions.question: Step by step instructions written to solve any problem is called
questions.explanation: An algorithm is the set of rules to solve a problem.

questions.question: Diagrammatic or symbolic representation of an algorithm is called
questions.explanation: A flowchart visually represents an algorithm.

questions.question: Object oriented programming method is followed in
questions.explanation: C++ and C# are OOP languages. C is procedural.

questions.question: Informed high level description of an algorithm in English is called
questions.explanation: Pseudocode describes steps in plain language.

questions.question: The geometrical figure [rectangle] shown here in a flow chart represents
questions.explanation: A Rectangle represents a Process step.

questions.question: This geometrical figure (circle) in a flow chart represents
questions.explanation: A Circle is used as an on-page connector.

questions.question: In Ms-access to open new database press
questions.explanation: Ctrl+N is the shortcut for New.

questions.question: The checking operation on input data is called the
questions.explanation: Data Validation ensures data meets criteria.

questions.question: The type of a query that extract data and put them into separate tables is called
questions.explanation: A Make-Table Query creates a new table from data.

questions.question: What is a firewall in computer network?

options.text: A system designed to prevent unauthorized access

questions.explanation: A firewall blocks unauthorized access.

questions.question: What is the benefit of computer networking
questions.explanation: Networking enables sharing, access, and backups.

questions.question: Which of the following is not a networking device
questions.explanation: Linux is an Operating System.

questions.question: DHCP server provides .... To the client
questions.explanation: DHCP assigns IP addresses.

questions.question: A set of rules that govern all aspects of information communication is called
questions.explanation: Protocol is the set of rules.

questions.question: What is the meaning of bandwidth in network

options.text: Transmission capacity of a communication channel
Class of IP used in network

questions.explanation: Bandwidth is the capacity or speed of the channel.

questions.question: What does router do in a network

options.text: Forwards a packet to all outgoing links
Forwards a packet to the next outgoing link
Determines on which outing link a packet is to be forwarded
Forwards a packet to all outgoing links except the originated link

questions.explanation: A router determines the path (routing).

questions.question: Which of the following layer is not a network support layer
questions.explanation: Physical, Data Link, and Network are network support layers. Transport links them to user support layers.

questions.question: Which of the following is not a type of server
questions.explanation: Bus is a topology, not a server type.

questions.question: Identify the odd one out of the following terms below
questions.explanation: Hackers are people; the others are software/outcomes.

questions.question: Which of the following devices is used to transfer data between LAN
questions.explanation: Routers connect different networks (LANs).

questions.question: How many types of IP addresses are there
questions.explanation: IPv4 and IPv6.

questions.question: Which of the following protocol sends electronic mail to the receiver's end
questions.explanation: SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) sends mail.
